thread.title: Trump 'made 'Chris Christie have the meatloaf for lunch | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Trump 'made 'Chris Christie have the meatloaf for lunch | Daily Mail Online

author: Associated Press
title: Trump 'made 'Chris Christie have the meatloaf for lunch | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad 'This is what it's like to be with Trump': President 'made' Gov. Chris Christie eat meatloaf during lunch at the White House Christie was at the White House on Tuesday to discuss the nation's opioid epidemic and watch Trump sign a bill that removes some Dodd-Frank regulations on oil and gas companies Christie said that while at lunch with wife, Pat, and Trump, the president told them to order whatever they wanted off the White House menu But then he said he and Christie would have the meatloaf, calling it 'fabulous' 'This is what it's like to be with Trump,' Christie joked Published: 02:33 GMT, 17 February 2017 | Updated: 04:56 GMT, 17 February 2017 5 shares
